message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient’s symptoms are consistent with cluster headaches, for which high-flow 100% oxygen is the best abortive treatment. Sumatriptan may also be effective, but it is not the best choice for this specific type of headache. Hydrocodone and intranasal lidocaine are not recommended for the treatment of cluster headaches.

Sumatriptan is used to treat migraine headaches, Hydrocodone is a narcotic pain reliever and Intranasal lidocaine is not an effective treatment for cluster headaches.

High-flow 100% oxygen is the best abortive treatment for cluster headaches. Sumatriptan is the first-line medication for acute treatment if oxygen therapy is not effective, but it is not the best choice in this scenario. Hydrocodone and intranasal lidocaine are not effective for treating cluster headaches.
